body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to CarCorp Support. My name is Justin Hernandez. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Justin, my name is Christine Wright.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christine. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number? Spoken as individual digits.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five - six seven eight - two three four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. And can you confirm your residential address? Please spell out the numbers for me.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My address is one two three Oak Street, Apartment two zero one, Willow Creek.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact details, Christine. Is there anything specific you'd like help with or any concerns you'd like to address today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited! I recently bought a car from CarCorp, but I have some concerns about the product quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand the importance of product quality. Thank you for sharing your concern with us, Christine. We will do our best to help. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance, Justin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Christine. Thank you for reaching out to CarCorp Support. If you need further help, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!
